behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink for washing
        
        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to wet the shirt
        
        wash(shirt) # Wash the shirt in the sink
        
        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after washing the shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt to be washed
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink for washing the shirt
        
        wash_shirt(shirt, sink)

def is_ironing_board_present():
    # Function to check if there is an ironing board available
    symbol has_ironing_board=exists board: item : is_ironing_board(board)
    return has_ironing_board

def is_iron_present():
    # Function to check if there is an iron available
    symbol has_iron=exists iron: item : is_iron(iron)
    return has_iron

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, board:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is clean before ironing
        
        achieve close_char(char, board)
        # Move the character closer to the ironing board
        
        achieve plugged(iron)
        # Ensure the iron is plugged in
        
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Turn the iron on
        
        achieve on(shirt, board)
        # Place the shirt on the ironing board

behavior unplug_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(iron)
        # Turn off the iron
        
        achieve unplugged(iron)
        # Unplug the iron

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt)
        # Select a clean shirt
        
        if is_ironing_board_present() and is_iron_present():
            bind board: item where:
                is_ironing_board(board)
            # Select an ironing board
            
            bind iron: item where:
                is_iron(iron)
            # Select an iron
            
            iron_shirt(shirt, iron, board)
            # Execute the ironing process
            
            unplug_iron(iron)
            # Unplug the iron after the task is completed

behavior plug_in_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        assert_hold has_plug(iron)
        achieve plugged(iron)

behavior turn_on_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(iron)

behavior iron_clothes(clothes:item, iron:item, board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(clothes, board)
        # Ironing the clothes involves placing them on the ironing board
        achieve_once inhand(iron)
        # Holding the iron to iron the clothes

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select the iron
        bind board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(board)
        # Select the ironing board
        bind clothes: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(clothes)
        # Select the shirt to be ironed

        plug_in_iron(iron)
        # Ensure the iron is plugged in
        turn_on_iron(iron)
        # Turn on the iron
        iron_clothes(clothes, iron, board)
        # Iron the shirts on the board

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt)
        # Select the clean shirt

        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board) and close(shirt, ironing_board)
        # Select the ironing board close to the shirt

        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron) and close(ironing_board, iron)
        # Select the iron close to the ironing board

        iron_shirt(shirt, ironing_board, iron)

behavior heat_up_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)

behavior prepare_shirt_for_ironing(shirt:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve close(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve close(iron, shirt)
        # For safety and subsequent tasks, ensure the iron is off after ironing:
        achieve is_off(iron)
